EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us: Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining us last week for our webinar <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar> "Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop" on July 15, 2014.
We presented a demo on how to add extensibility into Hadoop and more:
- How to eliminate the need to copy data from the underlying storage system to HDFS - How to leverage rich, deep and fast analytics on various Hadoop data files - How to conduct statistical and analytical functions from HAWQ to HBase or Hive data - How to run complex analytical queries that join in-database dimensional data with fact data stored in HBase - How to easily write your own custom PXF connectors to external data sources
We invite you to watch the replay <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar> to learn more about Pivotal HD <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-hd> and Pivotal Xtension Frameworks (PXF) <http://blog.gopivotal.com/pivotal/products/json-on-hadoop-example-for-extending-hawq-data-formats-using-pivotal-extension-framework-pxf>.
Thank you again for joining us and we will see you next time.
The Pivotal Team
